application_Windows

类 Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • application_Windows.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    the class that will hold the main frame of the application
    作者:
    Leo

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int HEIGHT 
      static int WIDTH 

    • 构造器概要

      Constructor method

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void changeComp(PanelID key)
      a public method that will allow the window to be changed in other panels
      void repaint()
      it will repaint the entire frame when called

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • WIDTH

        public static final int WIDTH
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • HEIGHT

        public static final int HEIGHT
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Window

        public Window(java.lang.String title,
              AssetManager assetManager,
              FileDownloader fileDownloader,
              FileManipulator fileManipulator)
        Constructor method
        参数:
        title - the title of the frame
        assetManager - the assetManager that initialize all images and some other data
        fileDownloader - the file downloader that will download the data
        fileManipulator - the file manipulate that will manipulate the downloaded data

    • 方法详细资料

      • changeComp

        public void changeComp(PanelID key)
        a public method that will allow the window to be changed in other panels
        参数:
        key - the PanelID to indicate which panel to be changed to

      • repaint

        public void repaint()
        it will repaint the entire frame when called
